--- AI Assistant ---

 I understand you're having trouble generating an emergency license for Serial number 45873 at CGX.

Based on our information, emergency licenses cannot be self-generated. To request an emergency license, you'll need to submit a ticket to NorthPlains Xinet Support. Here's what you should do:

 	* Submit a ticket selecting Licensing > Emergency License as the request type
 	* Set the priority to highest
 	* Include the following information in your request:

- Reseller Name
- Customer Company Name
- Email address to receive the license key
- Account Manager Name
- Hardware ID
- Serial Number (45873 in your case)
- Number of users that will authenticate against the system
- Xinet Version
- Studio (telescope): Yes or No
- License Type: Standard, Redundant, B, C, or SDK

Emergency licenses are typically issued for 45 days to address situations where your production Xinet server becomes unlicensed or your license has expired.

If you need immediate assistance with this process, please ask for a support agent in this chat.
